directions: Combine the tomatoes, cilantro, jalapeno, lime juice and 1 teaspoon salt in a blender. Pulse until the ingredients are broken down but still chunky, scraping down the inside of the carafe with a rubber spatula as necessary. Stir in the corn and scallions.
ingredients: 2 small yellow tomatoes, cored, seeded and chopped
1 jalapeno, charred under the broiler, seeded and chopped
title: Corn Blender Salsa
